title: Apply the Integral Property
text: Refer to the property of the integral $$\int_{a}^{b} f(x) \,dx=\int_{a}^{c} f(x) \,dx+\int_{c}^{b} f(x) \,dx$$.

title: Substitution
text: Substitute $$\int_{0}^{8} f(x) \,dx$$ with $$10$$ and $$\int_{0}^{5} f(x) \,dx$$ with $$5$$ then solve for $$\int_{5}^{8} f(x) \,dx$$. Solve like you normally would with algebra.
